project.name: J-C774A-LENY-05-ST01-DT03-DF11-CF01-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted.
project.run_command: env LENYA_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL" LENYA_WEBAPP_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp" JETTY_PORT="8888" JETTY_ADMIN_PORT="8889" java $SS_JAVA_OPTS -Djava.library.path=$SS_TC_DEPS/lib64/ -Xms32M -Xmx512M -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp "$SS_JAVA_CLASSPATH" -Djava.endorsed.dirs=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dorg.xml.sax.parser=org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser -Djetty.port=8888 -Dloader.jar.repositories=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/resources:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dwebapp=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp -Dhome=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL -Dorg.mortbay.util.URI.charset=ISO-8859-1 -Dloader.main.class=org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server Loader $SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/conf/main.xml

iopair.name: J-C774A-LENY-05-ST01-DT03-DF11-CF01-01-GOOD-01

iopair.name: J-C774A-LENY-05-ST01-DT03-DF11-CF01-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: if [[ -f "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/lenya__early_kill_3tMblglwTA.sh.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/lenya__early_kill_3tMblglwTA.sh.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_eA2DYT7x74EPPwOnP5Dt AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (file_handles_error_ZMeO9JjZvA) AND NOT timeout_njyi2q4ZGL) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((file_handles_error_ZMeO9JjZvA) OR timeout_njyi2q4ZGL)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (file_handles_error_ZMeO9JjZvA) AND NOT timeout_njyi2q4ZGL) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((file_handles_error_ZMeO9JjZvA) OR timeout_njyi2q4ZGL))
